original_text: He that backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
korean_text: 그의 혀로 남을 허물하지 아니하고 그의 이웃에게 악을 행하지 아니하며 그의 이웃을 비방하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: He that backbiteth not with his tongue
nor doeth evil to his neighbour
nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour
